radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild, bibasilar atelectasis; mild intrahepatic and extrahepatic biliary dilatation; small hiatal hernia; mild thickening of the left lateroconal fascia and mild fat stranding in the region of sigmoid diverticulosis; small amount of fluid in the pelvis and mild presacral edema; 8 mm hypodensity in the lower pole of the right kidney likely represents a simple renal cyst; no evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
